document.title: Class View and Object Browser Clusters

paragraph.paragraph: There are two types of clusters that will be shown when expanding a project folder. The icon will either show a cluster (../images/cluster/cluster.ico) or library cluster (../images/cluster/cluster_library.ico) based on the set cluster's ../../eiffelenvision_projects/configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/clusters.xmlcluster_libraryCluster Library Property for the corresponding ../../eiffelenvision_projects/structure/project_items/clusters_and_items/explicit_clusters.xmlcluster.

Cluster folders, like ../../eiffelenvision_projects/structure/project_items/clusters_and_items/explicit_clusters.xmlclusters, can be nested. Expanding cluster folders will show subclusters and any classes.xmlclasses found at that expanded cluster's level.
